item.title: 提供 "100%"下行保护的新股票 ETF 即将推出
item.description: 这听起来像是为股票投资者打防守反击的稳赚不赔的交易：ETF 将在股市不下跌的情况下下注。【原文：It sounds like a surefire, slam-dunk trade for stock investors playing defense: ETFs that will bet on equity markets without — the pitch says — going down.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 Rieder 认为美联储今年有可能两次降息
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）的里克-里德尔（Rick Rieder）表示，面对过去一个月收益率的痛苦上涨，债券投资者可能很快就会从通胀消退和美联储那里得到缓解。【原文：Bond investors confronting a painful run-up in yields in the past month may soon find relief from ebbing inflation and the Federal Reserve, according to BlackRock Inc.’s Rick Rieder.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗紧张局势有缓和迹象，黄金矿业股回落
item.description: 由于以色列和伊朗之间的地缘政治紧张局势有缓和迹象，金银价格下跌，金矿股遭遇了两个月来最糟糕的交易时段。【原文：Gold mining stocks are suffering their worst trading session in two months as the price of bullion drops amid signs of easing geopolitical tensions between Israel and Iran.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会因在加密货币案件中滥用职权而受到谴责，两名律师辞职
item.description: 两名美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）律师在一名联邦法官制裁并严厉斥责华尔街监管机构在一起加密货币案件中 "严重滥用 "权力后辞职。【原文：Two Securities and Exchange Commission lawyers resigned after a federal judge sanctioned and sharply rebuked the Wall Street regulator for “gross abuse” of power in a crypto case.】

item.title: BC Partners 的 iQera 与顾问合作修复资产负债表
item.description: 收债公司 iQera Group SAS 及其股东和顾问正在评估各种资本结构方案，该公司在周一发布的一份报告中称。【原文：Debt collector iQera Group SAS — along with its shareholders and advisers — is evaluating various options for its capital structure, the company said in a report published Monday.】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德公司因美国猪肉业务改善而利润大增
item.description: 美国史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）的所有者WH集团有限公司（WH Group Ltd.—）第一季度利润增长，原因是美国业务的 "大幅改善 "抵消了中国本土业务的下滑。【原文：WH Group Ltd. — the owner of US-based Smithfield Foods — saw profits rise in the first quarter as a “substantial improvement” in its US operations more than offset a decline in homeland China.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 公司抹去股票 330% 的涨幅
item.description: 津巴布韦的新货币使股市今年以来超过 330% 的涨幅化为乌有，让投资者不得不面对其后果。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency has wiped out a more than 330% gain on the stock market this year, leaving investors dealing with the fallout.】

item.title: Vivendi 放弃意大利电信股东对董事会的投票
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）最大的投资者维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）在电话运营商年度会议上投了弃权票，此举可能会间接帮助首席执行官皮埃特罗-拉布里奥拉（Pietro Labriola）在股东叛变中幸存下来。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA’s largest investor, Vivendi SE, abstained from voting at the phone carrier’s annual meeting, in a move that could indirectly help Chief Executive Officer Pietro Labriola survive a shareholder mutiny.】

item.title: 战争风险令交易商保持谨慎，石油从月度低点反弹
item.description: 西德克萨斯中质原油（West Texas Intermediate crude）从月度低点反弹，交易价格超过每桶 83 美元，因为战争风险继续对市场造成冲击。【原文：West Texas Intermediate crude bounced off a monthly low to trade above $83 a barrel as war risk continues to whipsaw the market.】

item.title: 英国脱欧后货物出口减少，经济向服务业倾斜
item.description: 官方数据显示，随着英国经济越来越依赖于向世界其他国家出售服务，英国的商品出口量仍低于脱欧前的水平。【原文：The UK is still exporting fewer goods than before Brexit, as the economy becomes more reliant on selling services to the rest of the world, according to official data.】

item.title: 拉加德重申欧美不应参与补贴竞赛
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）重申，欧洲和美国应避免过度提供经济福利，以促进经济增长。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde reiterated that Europe and the US should avoid excessively offering economic perks in a bid to boost growth.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称绿色量化宽松既不可取也不可能
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）说，欧洲中央银行无法解决绿色转型所面临的资金挑战，因为这在法律上是不可能的，而且会有引发通货膨胀的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank can’t be the solution to the funding challenges for the green transition as it’s legally impossible and would risk stoking inflation, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数收盘创 2023 年 2 月以来新高
item.description: 英国富时 100 指数一年多来首次创下收盘纪录新高，近几个月来，该指数受到能源相关股票以及地缘政治担忧缓解的广泛乐观情绪的提振。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high for the first time in more than a year, having been boosted in recent months by energy-related stocks as well as broader optimism that geopolitical concerns were easing.】

item.title: 资产管理公司将墨西哥比索多头削减幅度创 16 个月之最
item.description: 机构资产管理公司削减了对墨西哥比索的多头头寸，因为投资者解除了对墨西哥比索的套利交易押注，直到一周前，墨西哥比索还是今年新兴市场表现最好的货币。未来可能还会有更多。【原文：Institutional asset managers slashed their long positions on the Mexican peso as investors unwound carry trade bets on what was until a week ago the best performing currency in emerging markets this year. More may be to come.】

item.title: WeWork 债权人要求公司与潜在买家谈判
item.description: 一个由级别较低的债权人组成的小组在一份法庭文件中表示，应强制办公空间巨头 WeWork 公司与潜在买家（可能包括联合创始人亚当-诺伊曼）进行谈判，并在 30 天的期限内提出退出破产的计划。【原文：Coworking giant WeWork Inc. should be forced to negotiate with potential buyers, possibly including co-founder Adam Neumann, as well as given a 30-day deadline to come up with a plan to exit bankruptcy, a panel of lower-ranking creditors said in a court filing.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称，Cigna 和 Humana 合并交易 "现在数学上可行了"。
item.description: 据杰富瑞公司（Jefferies）称，在股价上涨到交易具有财务意义的程度后，Cigna 集团可能会重新开始放弃对 Humana 公司的收购。【原文：Cigna Group could resume its abandoned pursuit of Humana Inc. after the stock prices have moved to the point where a deal makes financial sense, according to Jefferies.】

item.title: 拖拉机制造商 CNH 意外更换首席执行官后业绩下滑
item.description: 首席执行官斯科特-怀恩（Scott Wine）意外宣布将于 6 月底离职后，美国银行（Bank of America）下调了这家农用机械制造商的评级，CNH Industrial NV 的股价创下 11 月以来最大跌幅。【原文：CNH Industrial NV’s shares fell by the most since November after Bank of America downgraded the farm machinery maker following an unexpected announcement that Chief Executive Officer Scott Wine will leave at the end of June.】

item.title: 在关键财报发布前，苹果被美国银行评为 2024 年最佳选择
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）将苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. was named a top pick for 2024 at Bank of America on optimism over the iPhone maker’s upcoming results, as well as its longer-term prospects.】

item.title: 阿斯达开始利用新的 10.5 亿欧元定期贷款解决债务问题
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份公告，阿斯达集团（Asda Group Ltd）将推出一笔 10.5 亿欧元（11 亿美元）的定期贷款，为 2026 年到期的债务进行部分再融资。【原文：Asda Group Ltd is marketing a €1.05 billion ($1.1 billion) term loan to partially refinance debt coming due in 2026, according to an announcement seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 华尔街欢呼厄瓜多尔诺沃亚公投获胜
item.description: 周一，厄瓜多尔债券在新兴市场主权债券中涨幅居前，交易商对丹尼尔-诺沃亚总统在周日公投中的强势表现欢呼雀跃。【原文：Ecuadorian bonds led gains among emerging-market sovereign peers Monday as traders cheered President Daniel Noboa’s strong showing in Sunday’s referendum.】

item.title: 赛诺菲将支付 1 亿美元解决善达癌症诉讼案
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，赛诺菲将支付 1 亿多美元，以了结约 4000 起指控这家法国制药商未能警告用户其 Zantac 胃灼热药可能致癌的诉讼。【原文：Sanofi will pay more than $100 million to settle about 4,000 lawsuits accusing the French drugmaker of failing to warn users that its Zantac heartburn medicine could cause cancer, according to people familiar with the deal.】

item.title: 再融资迫在眉睫，德国农业公司放弃欧元债券
item.description: 德国拜瓦公司（BayWa AG）周一取消了欧元债券销售，而此时距离该公司现有的一种欧元债券到期仅有几周时间。【原文：Germany’s BayWa AG scrapped a euro bond sale Monday, just weeks before one of its existing notes in the currency will mature.】

item.title: 欧盟就应用程序发布发出最后通牒，TikTok 面临罚款风险
item.description: ByteDance Ltd.在法国和西班牙推出 TikTok Lite 应用程序时，没有提供全面的风险评估，欧盟周一开始调查该公司是否违反了欧盟的新内容法。【原文：The European Union opened a new probe Monday into whether ByteDance Ltd. violated the bloc’s new content law when it launched its TikTok Lite app in France and Spain without providing a full risk assessment.】

item.title: 伊拉克称恢复库尔德斯坦石油出口 "尚需时日
item.description: 伊拉克政府发言人表示，由于与库尔德地区政府和石油生产商的谈判仍在继续，通过已关闭一年多的输油管道恢复库尔德斯坦向土耳其出口石油的工作将需要更长的时间。【原文：The return of oil exports from Kurdistan to Turkey through a pipeline that’s been shut for more than a year will take longer as negotiations continue with the regional government and oil producers, a Iraqi government spokesman said.】

item.title: 盈利增长放缓，瑞银下调对 "六大 "科技股的看法
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席美国股票策略师表示，随着大型科技公司一度出现的盈利势头面临降温，这些公司的动力正在耗尽。【原文：Big tech companies are running out of steam as the earnings momentum once enjoyed by the sector faces a cool down, according to UBS Group AG’s chief US equity strategist.】

item.title: 印度法院受理针对 Zee 公司苏巴什-钱德拉的破产申诉
item.description: 印度一家破产法院已开始对 Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. 的创始人兼名誉董事长苏巴什-钱德拉（Subhash Chandra）启动破产程序，该程序是应 Indiabulls Housing Finance Ltd. 在贷款违约后提出的请求而启动的。【原文：A bankruptcy court in India has begun insolvency proceedings against Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd.’s founder and chairman emeritus Subhash Chandra on a plea by Indiabulls Housing Finance Ltd. following a loan default.】

item.title: 摩根大通的鲍勃-米歇尔认为 "洗牌 "将为债券带来买入时机
item.description:
"我努力抓住所有的手指和脚趾，并保持我的纪律，"他说

。【原文：

‘I’m trying to hang onto all my fingers and toes and keep my discipline,’ he says

】

item.title: 华伦天奴主席押注米歇尔加盟后奢华不再
item.description: 华伦天奴（Valentino）董事长预言，时尚界所谓的静谧奢华时代已经过去，富裕的消费者将再次需要大胆的设计。【原文：The fashion industry’s era of so-called quiet luxury is over and affluent consumers will want bold designs again, the chairman of Valentino has predicted.】

item.title: 投资银行业务不景气，Alantra 德国裁员一半
item.description: Alantra Partners SA 已将其德国分部的员工人数裁减了约一半，因为这家西班牙公司在交易荒之后对其投资银行业务进行了重组。【原文：Alantra Partners SA has cut staff numbers by about half at its German unit as the Spanish firm reorganizes its investment banking business following a drought in dealmaking.】

item.title: 被忽视的拉美外汇反弹已时日无多
item.description: 这是 "超级比索 "的终结，但不是抢占所有头条新闻的 "超级比索"。【原文：It’s the end of the “super peso,” but not the one that has grabbed all the headlines.】
